scikits.statsmodels.sandbox.regression.try_ols_anova.data2dummy¶

scikits.statsmodels.sandbox.regression.try_ols_anova.data2dummy(x, returnall=False)¶
convert array of categories to dummy variables by default drops dummy variable for last category uses ravel, 1d only
